IKBone: Name of bone to control. This is the main bone chain to modify from. *
StartStretchRatio: Limits to use if stretching is allowed. This value determines when to start stretch. For example, 0.9 means once it reaches 90% of the whole length of the limb, it will start apply.
MaxStretchScale: Limits to use if stretching is allowed. This value determins what is the max stretch scale. For example, 1.5 means it will stretch until 150 % of the whole length of the limb.
EffectorLocation: Effector Location. Target Location to reach.
JointTargetLocation: Joint Target Location. Location used to orient Joint bone. *
TwistAxis: Specify which axis it's aligned. Used when removing twist
JointTargetLocationSpace: Reference frame of Joint Target Location.
LODThreshold:
* Max LOD that this node is allowed to run
* For example if you have LODThreshold to be 2, it will run until LOD 2 (based on 0 index)
* when the component LOD becomes 3, it will stop update/evaluate
* currently transition would be issue and that has to be re-visited
Alpha: Current strength of the skeletal control
bAllowStretching: Should stretching be allowed, to be prevent over extension
bTakeRotationFromEffectorSpace: Set end bone to use End Effector rotation
bMaintainEffectorRelRot: Keep local rotation of end bone
bAllowTwist: Whether or not to apply twist on the chain of joints. This clears the twist value along the TwistAxis
